explanation: [0-0] In an indoor setting, a British Shorthair cat wearing an orange shirt sits on the left side of a table, looking to the right. There are two glasses of water on the table. On the right sits a person with an afro, wearing sunglasses and a black top. The white subtitle "Blind Hitman pt.7" appears on a light blue background.

[0-5] First, the person with the afro hugs the cat, which then takes out a syringe with its paw. The camera zooms in as the liquid in the syringe is injected into the glass in front of the person. The person turns their head to look, and a red question mark appears next to their head. The question mark then disappears, and the water in the glass in front of the person turns brownish-yellow. The person releases the cat, and the subtitle "It's my tummy" appears above the cat.
